mapper.select: SELECT m."userNm", vTable3.* FROM ( SELECT mngno, userno, eleid, eleval FROM ( SELECT mu.mngno , mu.userno , ma.attval FROM mng_user mu LEFT JOIN mng_attendance ma ON mu.userno = ma.userno WHERE mu.mngno = #{mngno} ) as vTable1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT eleid, eleval FROM div_ele WHERE grpid='attendance' ) as vTable2 ON vTable1.attval = vTable2.eleid ) as vTable3 LEFT JOIN member m ON m."userNo" = vTable3.userno ORDER BY userno ASC
